room_title: Escape room "Cardinals Quest" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: Great experience! Staff was friendly and helpful, we did the Cardinals game and it was a lot of fun for 6 of us. 5 stars and two thumbs up!

room_title: Escape room "Cardinals Quest" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: A work group did the Cardinals Quest room this weekend. We had a great time! We didn't escape but had so much fun trying. The staff was very helpful...especially when we were stuck on clues! I will definitely try another room here! Would recommend it to anyone!

room_title: Escape room "Cardinals Quest" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: The Cardinals Quest was one of the best rooms we have done so far. One clue from finishing but it truly was challenging. Next time we come thru St Louis we will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Cardinals Quest" by Mastermind Room Escape in St. Louis
review: I took my 12-year-old daughter on her birthday for the Cardinals room. Not only was it complete blast but the staff was absolutely incredible. They helped us with a new we are struggling and made us feel very comfortable. The room was very challenging but yet doable! I definitely recommend Mastermind Room Escape. Very well done.
